name: Construct (LukeQuinn, Georgi Tsaklev "Morwoen")
description:
Construct is a 3D puzzle platformer in which you must use abilities that you have found traversing the temple to explore deeper within. Through changing the material of objects you can make objects bouncy, heavy or float. 

You play as a traveller who stumbles upon a magical temple. Explore the different sections and solve the mysteries utilising the abilities granted to you by the Tree of Life - altering the building blocks of reality.

Contributors:

Luke Quinn, Georgi Tsaklev, James Waters, Luke Perry, Mary Tenney
